text:
The original summary for this bug was longer than 255 characters, and so it was truncated when Bugzilla was upgraded. The original summary was:

Write a servlet and add it to a web app.  Map wild card with an extension to that servlet then address a file with that extension from the browser.  Going directly to tomcat will cause the servlet to invoke.  Going through Apache won't work. BugRat Report#281
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
